title.en: A Common Story of a Lady's New Life

altTitles.en: The Stereotypical Life of a Reincarnated Lady
The Circumstances of a Stereotypical Reincarnated Lady
Life of a Lady After Rebirth

altTitles.fr: La vie ordinaire d'une lady réincarnée

altTitles.pt-br: A vida estereotipada de uma lady reencarnada

altTitles.th: ชีวิตเรียบง่ายของหญิงสาวผู้กลับชาติมาเกิด

altTitles.ja: ありふれた転生女子の事情

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Rập Khuôn Của Một Quý Cô Tái Sinh

description.en:
Valerie thought she’d be a genius mage in this world. But when her magic can’t get past basic and her teacher shares a prophecy of a tiger coming to attack(!!), she opts to enjoy an ordinary life. Everything’s fine until she’s engaged to none other than Duke Kylus Dwello. It’s just one thing after another—the mysterious Serena, the servants who ship the duke and Serena, a prince who doesn’t understand boundaries, and even the duke looming over her bed! Can she get back to her nice, quiet life?

*Note: Raw chapters are free every Saturday on Daum Webtoon and Kakaopage!*

---

description.id:
Kehidupan klise dari hubungan romantis yang terhalang tembok besi milik Valerie!

description.ja:
「バレリー」は18歳。平凡に暮らしていた前世では交通事故に遭って死んでしまったが、ボルシェイク伯爵家の長女として再び生まれ変わる。 「バレリー」は幼い頃に師匠である魔法使いに、自分の未来の姿を予言されてから、平凡に生きることを望んでいるが、父が決めた結婚相手が帝国で誰もが羨む若き公爵「カイロス」だったーー！ しかも「カイロス」の城には「バレリー」の前世と似た黒髪で黒い瞳の女「セレニア」が住んでいることから「バレリー」は彼女の次元移動を疑い、平凡でない日々が始まる。

---

description.pt-br:
Uma jovem reencarna como Valeria Rea Bolshake, a filha mais velha do conde Bolshake. Nesse novo mundo onde magia e monstros existem, Valeria abraça sua nova realidade e se esforça para se tornar alguém especial e assim viver uma vida de aventuras. Contudo, o seu tutor de magia desaparece após deixar uma profecia de morte para ela e Valeria decide evitar esse futuro se tornando uma lady normal, mas as rodas do destino começam a girar para uma estranha direção quando uma jovem de cabelos negros aparece do nada nesse mundo.

description.zh:
重生来到这个世界的瓦莱里，由于拥有上一世的记忆与学识，被称之为天才。幻想过上不同生活的她，选择学习魔法，却被老师告知毫无天赋并会迎来悲惨的结局。小心活着她，偶然发现这里还有其他穿越人，而瓦莱里也并不只是穿到小说里那么简单...

---
